news.title: Jack White fires back at White House after they called him a “has been loser”
news.summary: “Being insulted by the actual White House that this particular conman leads is a badge of honor for me,” the rocker wrote.

news.title: Ireland rugby stars Linda Djougang and Anna McGann: "We want to see more girls taking on rugby, especially with the World Cup being on"
news.summary: Ireland stars Linda Djougang and Anna McGann tell Riccardo Dwyer about their inspiring journeys to the top of women’s  rugby, as they look ahead with high expectations to the World Cup in England.

news.title: Queens of The Stone Age at Royal Hospital Kilmainham (Photos)
You Bring The Energy, Flogas Brings The Power: Electric Picnic’s Official Energy Partner to power Main Stage with renewable electricity
news.summary: Irish wind power is set to be the star of the show at Electric Picnic 2025 – with Flogas powering the festival’s Main Stage with renewable electricity from Jaroma Wind Farm in Co. Tipperary…
